exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.NFTGashaponViewSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bgImg" width="1920" height="1080" source="BG_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
	<e:Group id="gashaponGP" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
	<e:Group id="touchGP" height="250" width="250" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="70" />
	<e:Group id="leftUIGP" touchEnabled="true" width="600" height="250" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="leftOnImg" width="606" height="1080" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="Left_Menu_On_png" />
		<e:Image id="leftOffImg" width="606" height="1080" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="Left_Menu_Off_png"
		         visible="false" />
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="rightUIGP" touchEnabled="true" width="600" height="250" x="1311" y="0">
		<e:Image id="rightOnImg" width="606" height="1080" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="0" source="Right_Menu_On_png" />
		<e:Image id="rightOffImg" width="606" height="1080" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="0" source="Right_Menu_Off_png"
		         visible="false" />
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
